## installation

You can install the development version of `plutor` like so:

``` r
devtools::install_github("william-swl/plutor")
```
And load the package:
```{r library}
library(plutor)
```

## color

- select most distant colors among a color spectrum
```{r color-select_color}
select_color(5)
```
